english.segment1: This might hurt. It's not safe. But I know that I've gotta make a change. I don't care. If I break. At least I'll be feeling something
english.segment2: Cause just OK. Is not enough. Help me fight through the nothingness of life
english.segment3: I dont wanna go through the motions. I dont wanna go one more day. Without Your all consuming passion inside of me. I dont wanna spend my whole life asking. What if I had given everything?. Instead of going through the motions
english.segment4: No regrets. Not this time. I'm gonna let my heart defeat my mind. Let Your love. Make me whole. I think Im finally feeling something
english.segment5: 'Cause just OK. Is not enough. Help me fight through the nothingness of life
english.segment6: I dont wanna go through the motions. I dont wanna go one more day. Without Your all consuming passion inside of me. I dont wanna spend my whole life asking. What if I had given everything?. Instead of going through the motions
english.segment7: Take me all the way. Take me all the way
